description: The Men's Intraknit™ Merino Fleece Full Zip Hoodie seemlessly integrates insulation, articulation, and ventilation to amplify movement and comfort during your most high-intensity activities. Mesh ventilation under the arms provides beathability you need it most, while insulating terry loops help make sure you're still warm. From training to running mile after mile, let this men's fleece help you feel your best — start to finish.
name: Smartwool Intraknit Merino Fleece Hoodie - Mens

specs.value: 57% Cotton, 38% Polyester, 5% Elastane. Exclusive Of Decoration
Insulation, articulation, and ventilation are seamlessly integrated to amplify movement and comfort during high-intensity activities
